text: Master of Kineticism

Torinubar has honed the art of Kineticism, also called "Minaith Qhaysh", a school of High Magic consisting on focusing the essence of the True Magic into kinetic energies, used for both defensive and offensive purposes.
High Mage of Qhaysh
As expected of a veteran member of the order of the White Tower, and even if his speciality is the Kineticist style ,Torinubar wields the lore of Qhaysh expertly.
Greater Arcane Conduit
Forces of Qhaysh, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!
Disrupt Magic
Using his mastery over Qhaysh and his mastery of the Kineticist style, Torinubar can use waves of True Magic energy to disrupt the concentration of enemy spellcasters.
Trading Acumen
Years of ruling over an important Asur trading post far from the High Elven metropolis has given Torinubar an unique insight on trade and resource management.
Kinetic Wave

One of Torinubar's unique techniques consist on perfectly weaving and compressing a ball of True Magic and then releasing it's energies in a powerful kinetic shockwave, pushing all his foes away from him.
Mage Lord of the Gates of Calith
Torinubar has ruled over the Gates of Calith for centuries now in the name of the Phoenix Kings of Ulthuan, as such, he has become accustomed to managing the trade routes that pass through them.
Torinubar Skills
Convoy Master Skills
This one understands tactics, and how to vary them, well enough to generally defeat the foe.
Competent
Our forefathers followed the way and overcame great adversity. We should not ignore their lessons.
Respectful
Some minds are more susceptible to magical influence than others, but this one is strong indeed.
Strong-Willed
This one moves like lightning, ducking and twisting to avoid their opponent's blows.
Elusive
The very picture of good health. Clearly, there's many years still ahead of them.
Hale & Hearty
Every action is executed seemingly without effort.
Trained
If you wish to live, it's best to keep your eyes open and your head down.
Observant
You need a plan. Never let anyone tell you otherwise. Devise a plan, then execute it - and preferably the enemy - haha!
Organised
Right, are you listening? Good. There's only one way to do things and that's by the book.
Doctrinal
Immovable and resolute in their will, this one is as determined as the World Dragon himself!
Dragon-Willed
Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.
Resistant
You really don't want to be on the receiving end of an attack made by this one. You really donâ€™t.
Dangerous
Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.
Resilient
This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.
Vigorous
More than skilled, this one shows great proficiency in matters of war.
Adept
Form, fire, charge, flank, repeat. This one shows that it really can be that simple.
Efficient
Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
Great Eagle
The eldest, most powerful Dragons can destroy entire units with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.
Star Dragon
These elite Asur swordsmen have sworn to defend the Gates of Calith from all who threaten them, and Torinubar will die with them
Guardians of Calith
